meanings.definition: A disease caused by infection with parasitic worms of the genus Onchocerca.
meanings.sent1: The community health worker explained the dangers of onchocerciases to the villagers.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying ways to prevent the spread of onchocerciases in endemic regions.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled when they heard a silly song about onchocerciases during the health education session.
meanings.sent4: The spread of misinformation can be like onchocerciases, slowly infecting the minds of many.
meanings.sent5: The image of the tangled worms causing onchocerciases haunted her dreams.

meanings.definition: The presence of Onchocerca worms in the body, leading to symptoms such as skin lesions and eye damage.
meanings.sent1: The doctor confirmed the diagnosis of onchocerciases after examining the patient's skin lesions.
meanings.sent2: Onchocerciases can cause severe itching and discomfort for those affected.
meanings.sent3: The onchocerciases in his body seemed to have a mind of their own, causing mischief.
meanings.sent4: The burden of onchocerciases weighed heavily on her, affecting her daily life.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the Onchocerca worms causing onchocerciases made her stomach turn.
